MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the PA14 postcode area of Port Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:02pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:55 PM on Wednesday, 14 October 2020.
